questions.question: Wabonye gute muri rusangi iyi reresi?
answers: Nayikunze kandi yari ngira kamaro
Ntaho mpagaze kandi nibaza ko vyoba vyari ngira kamaro canke atari ngira kamaro
Sinahimbawe n'iyi reresi kandi nibaza ko itari ngira kamaro

questions.question: Ni ubuhe bushobozi buri muri ino reresi?
answers: kutadohoka
kwubaka ubwonko bwawe
Ugutatura amatati hamwe n'impari

questions.question: Ni iyihe ntumbero y'agakorwa?
answers: Gufasha abanyeshure gutahura ko bagenzi babo bafise ivyo bahuriyeko hamwe n'ivyo bahuriyeko
Gufasha abanyeshure kumenya ibitera amatati hamwe n'inzira zo kuyatatura
Gufasha abnyeshure kwiga kugenzura ibishika vyabo

questions.question: Haba iki iyo umurwi uhejeje kwereka isomero amatati yawo
answers: Isomero riratanga inzira zo gutatura ayo matati umurwi wasabikanije
Umwigisha arashimira uwo murwi bagaca bicara
Umurwi urasabikanya ukuntu wari gutatura amatati

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Notegerezwa gutondeka amatati ku kibaho mu gihe isomero ririko rirayatanga
Notegerezwa kwandika umuti w'ayo matati yatanzwe n'abanyeshure ku kibaho ntakoresheje ijambo ku rindi.
Notegerezwa kubwira abanyeshure banje ko amatati biyumviriyeko ko ari akarorero kabi hanyuma nkabasaba kwicara

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Notegerezwa gusabikanya uburorero bumwe bumwe bw'amatati hamwe n'inzira zo gutatura ayo matati mu gihe abanyeshure bibagora kuyiyumvira
Notegerezwa guha abanyeshure uburorero bwose hamwe n'umuti wo gutatura amatati
Notegerezwa kubwira abanyeshure neza na neza ukuntu botaturha ayo matati

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kuba utariko urakora?
answers: Sintegerezwa gutera intege abanyeshure ngo batange uburorero bwabo bw'amatati hamwe n'umuti wayo
Sintegerezwa guha abanyeshure uko vyagenze ku bijanye n'ivyogenda neza hamwe n'ivyogenda nabi mu gihe bariko baratatura amatati
Isintegerezwa kureka abanyeshure batate bakoranako ku mubiri iyo bariko barerekana canke bakina bigirisha amatati yabo

questions.question: Ni akahe karorero k'ikibazo wotegerezwa kubaza mu mwanya w'igice c'ikiganiro c'aka gakorwa?
answers: Ni ubuhe buhinga bushasha wize bujanye n'ukuntu utatura amatati?
Ni kuki ari ngirakamaro gushobora kwiyumvamwo inyiyumvo zitaraba?
Ni kuki wibaza ko ari ngirakamaro kumenya ihuriro hamwe n'ubudasa mu bo mwigana?

questions.question: Wotegerezwa gukora iki mu gihe abanyeshure bawe bama basabikanya ubwoko bumwe bw'amatati buri gihe ukoresheje aka gikorwa?
answers: Notegerezwa guhitamwo abanyeshure bameze neza gusa mu gutera inkuru zijanye n'amatati
Notegerezwa gusabikanya ibigize amatati bitandukanye mu kugerageza abanyeshure bahindagure udukuru
Notegerezwa guhata abanyeshue ngo basabikanye amatati y'ukuri yabashikiye mu buzima bwabo
